Fall_River.Ashley House (Fall River, Massachusetts):
The Ashley House (also known as Aunt Polly's House) was a historic house located at 3159 Main Street in Fall River, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
The house was built in about 1750 in the Steep Brook section of the town, which was then still part of Freetown. It was a 2-1/2 story, wood-framed structure, five bays wide, with a side-gable roof and clapboard siding.
